repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This masnucript is a commentary on Yajurveda chapter 5. Front cover has a note written on paper and in English. bhaṭṭabhāskarīya 5th (illegible 4 syllables in Roman script.) bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 5th kāṇḍa in Granth P 103 12 L.
Folio are old and have patches so some text is faded. Some folio with marginal additions.

msItem.title: Bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 5th kāṇḍa
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit: 1v1 īśānaḥ sarvavidyānām bhūtānāmiśvaraḥ paraḥ punātu sarvadā yuṣmānśabdabrahmamayaśśivaḥ .. ataḥ paramagnikāṇḍamagnyārṣeyamārabhyate . tatrādyaṃ praśnacatuṣṭayamekaṃ kāṇḍaṃ caturthakāṇḍamāmnāta 1v 2 mmantrabrāhmaṇam .
msItem.explicit: 52v 8 t. yo tatra sthāneśvadhayānnena vayamadema liṅgyāśiṣyaṅg . caturviṃśatiḥ dyauste pṛṣṭhamiti sarvātmatayāśvastūyate pṛṣṭhaṃ uparibhāgaḥ sadhastaṃ sahaśthānaṃ supistha iti kaḥ sadhamādhasthayoriti . a 52v 9 yaṃ sadhādeśaḥ

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 3 blank folio and 52 written folio

support.p: thin palm leaf as a cover guard.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Folio are old and have patches so some text is faded. Some folio with marginal additions.

additions.desc: Front cover has a note written on paper and in English. bhaṭṭabhāskarīya 5th (illegible 4 syllables in Roman script.) bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 5th kāṇḍa in Granth P 103 12 L.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 8-9 kāṇḍa 5 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 17 Mysore Government Branch press 1898 .(Vol 1-10 available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Some spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v1 īśānaḥ sarvavidyānām bhūtānāmiśvaraḥ paraḥ punātu sarvadā yuṣmānśabdabrahmamayaśśivaḥ .. ataḥ paramagnikāṇḍamagnyārṣeyamārabhyate . tatrādyaṃ praśnacatuṣṭayamekaṃ kāṇḍaṃ caturthakāṇḍamāmnāta 1v 2 mmantrabrāhmaṇam .
52v 8 t. yo tatra sthāneśvadhayānnena vayamadema liṅgyāśiṣyaṅg . caturviṃśatiḥ dyauste pṛṣṭhamiti sarvātmatayāśvastūyate pṛṣṭhaṃ uparibhāgaḥ sadhastaṃ sahaśthānaṃ supistha iti kaḥ sadhamādhasthayoriti . a 52v 9 yaṃ sadhādeśaḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ .. hariḥ oṃ …
